message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for both of us - you get a valuable asset for a price below its worth to you, and I get a good price for my product. Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to this purchase, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. I'm confident we can work out a mutually beneficial deal.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $900,000 is closer to what I'm looking for, but I can't go that low just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950,000. It's still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let's finalize this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm thinking more along the lines of $920,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it's worth it to me. Can we meet in the middle again?
